Ghosts of Ghostbusters

A Dear Cast & Crew Series

They came, they saw, they kicked it’s ass… And then they died.

To celebrate the re-release and 30th anniversary of Ghostbusters, Dear Cast and Crew presents a 10-part series dedicated to the memory of the people who helped make the film a classic.

The Movies

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Harold Ramis

Dear Harold Ramis,
Writer and Actor

By Jared Young

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Elmer Bernstein

Dear Elmer Bernstein,
Composer

By Jared Young

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: David E. Blewitt

Dear David E. Blewitt,
Editor

By Casey Tourangeau

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Chuck Gaspar

Dear Chuck Gaspar,
Special Effects Supervisor

By Casey Tourangeau

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Jim Bullock

Dear Jim Bullock,
Sound Editor

By Di Golding

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Bernie Brillstein

Dear Bernie Brillstein,
Executive Producer

By Di Golding

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: László Kovács

Dear Laszlo Kovacs,
Director of Photography

By Cory Haggart

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Theoni V. Aldredge

Dear Theoni V. Aldredge,
Costume Designer

By Cory Haggart

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: John De Cuir

Dear John De Cuir,
Production Designer

By Christopher Redmond

Ghosts of Ghostbusters: Ruth Oliver

Dear Ruth Oliver,
Library Ghost

By Christopher Redmond
